Quick search

Reptate Keyboard Shortcuts¶

Contents

  • Application Manager
  • Data Set
  • Theory

Application Manager¶

Press this key To do this
Ctrl+1 New MWD Application
Ctrl+2 New TTS Application
Ctrl+3 New LVE Application
Ctrl+4 New NLVE Application
Ctrl+5 New Gt Application
Ctrl+6 New Creep Application
Ctrl+7 New SANS Application
Ctrl+8 New React Application
Ctrl+9 New Dielectric Application
Ctrl+0 New S(q,t) Application
Ctrl+Q Quit Reptate

Data Set¶

Press this key To do this
Ctrl+N New Data Set
Ctrl+O Add files to current dataset
Alt+N New theory (from dropdown box)

Theory¶

Press this key To do this
Alt+C Calculate current theory
Alt+M Fit current theory
